title: Ticket #4622: Ditch MD5 and support modern hashing algorithms (SHA-1, SHA-2, etc.)
description: OpenSSL supports many newer hash algorithms, but HTCondor doesn't know about them and doesn't have the ability to request them. We should add that.
remarks:
2014-Sep-29 14:49:05 by bbockelm:
Any reason why we shouldn't just skip straight to SHA-2? Folks are starting to migrate away from SHA-1 already...

2016-Apr-11 15:58:20 by tannenba:
I'd like to bump this to the v8.5.x series. Also should move beyond DES to AES.
